comments.body:
The construction of `PutEventsRequestEntry` isn't clear for the Java DSL example. Can you include your `detailEntry` method in the docs?  You can include multiple snippets in the docs by using the same tag `#run-events-entry` multiple times in `EventBridgePublisherTest`.

Or maybe we can create our own API for both Java and Scala DSLs can map to the `PutEventsRequestEntry`.  WDYT?
